question.title: How many runs will be scored in the knockout stage of the 2026 World Baseball Classic?
question.description:
The [World Baseball Classic](https://www.mlb.com/world-baseball-classic) (WBC) is an international baseball tournament featuring players from leagues such as [Major League Baseball](https://www.mlb.com/), [Nippon Professional Baseball](https://npb.jp/eng/), and [the KBO League](http://eng.koreabaseball.com/). The knockout stage consists of single-elimination games following the group stage and includes the Quarterfinals, Semifinals, and the Championship Final.

Knockout-stage games are played under standard WBC rules, including extra innings if necessary, and runs are scored in the same manner as in professional baseball.

Previous WBC tournaments have generally featured higher run scoring than Major League Baseball games, though scoring in individual knockout-stage games can vary widely depending on matchups and game conditions.

`{"format":"metac_reveal_and_close_in_period","info":{"post_id":41684,"question_id":41423}}`
question.resolution_criteria:
This question will resolve as the total number of runs scored in all games of the 2026 World Baseball Classic knockout stage, according to the [official WBC game pages on MLB.com's World Baseball Classic site](https://www.mlb.com/world-baseball-classic).

The knockout stage is defined to include all Quarterfinal games, all Semifinal games, and the Championship Final.
question.fine_print:
The total runs scored will be calculated by summing the runs of both teams in the final score of each game. 

If a game is ended early, a game is cancelled, or any other factor impacts scoring, this question will still use the official final score.

If the primary resolution source is unavailable, a reputable secondary source (e.g., Baseball-Reference) may be used.

***
This question's information (resolution criteria, fine print, background info, etc) is synced with an [original identical question](https://www.metaculus.com/questions/41684) which opened on 2026-01-28 17:00:00. This question will resolve based on the resolution criteria and fine print contained above. However, if this question would resolve differently than the original question, then this question will be annulled. Additionally, if the original question's resolution could have been known before this question opened, then this question will be annulled.
question.short_title: Total runs in knockout stage of 2026 WBC?
